origination.corpname: Washington State University. International Education Department

did.unittitle: Preliminary Guide to the Washington State University International Education Department Records
did.abstract: The International Education department's administrative correspondence with foreign universities and individuals, sign up and booking forms, course equivalent catalogs, and administrative forms and enrollment data. Records cover 1983-1987.

bioghist.p: Originally called the Office of International Programs established in 1963 to coordinate and oversee the International Study Abroad programs. This program was reorganized in 1971 resulting in an apparent name change although the tasks of the office remained the same, coordinating programs with foreign student sponsoring agencies and universities. This program also appears to have encompassed NICSA (Northwest Interinstitutional Council on Study Abroad). The program underwent another reorganizing in the late 1980's resulting in the offices present day organization.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of the International Education department's records from 1983-1987. It includes administrative correspondence with foreign universities and individuals, sign up and booking forms, course equivalent catalogs, and administrative forms and enrollment data.

arrangement.p: This is an unprocessed collection. Any arrangement reflects either a pre-existing order from the records' creators or previous custodians, or preliminary sorting performed by staff.

The materials appear to be organized in the order in which they came in. Box 1 contains correspondents with officials, materials on exchange programs, materials on organization including NASULGC ( National Association of State Universities and Land-Grant Colleges), CIEE (Counsel on International Exchange), NICSA (Northwest Interinstitutional Council on Study Abroad). Box 2 contains correspondence with officials and administrative groups.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open and available for research use.

prefercite.p: Preliminary Guide to the Washington State University International Education Department Records, 1970-1987 (UA1988-24)
Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections, Washington State University Libraries, Pullman, WA.

acqinfo.p: This material was transferred to WSU Libraries' MASC by 'Terry' of International Education on May 16, 1988 and retained as UA1988-24.

relatedmaterial.p: Two other sets of materials from International Education are held as UA1988-22 and UA1988-26.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.
